segments.text: I am looking for a blouse . Can you show me the way , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , what style do you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have no idea . Could you recommend me one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about this one ? It fits you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the style is quite good , but I think it's too showy . I would like to try on the lighter one .
segments.speaker: S1
